meanings.sent1: The directresses of the school ensured that all students were safe.
meanings.sent2: The directresses of the company held an important meeting to discuss the new project.
meanings.sent3: The directresses decided to have a fun dress-up day at work.
meanings.sent4: She was the directress of the play, guiding the actors like a conductor leads an orchestra.
meanings.sent5: The directresses, with their confident leadership, steered the organization towards success.

meanings.definition: Women who are in charge or oversee a particular activity or organization.
meanings.sent1: The directresses managed the event smoothly and efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The directresses of the charity worked tirelessly to help those in need.
meanings.sent3: The directresses organized a surprise party for their colleague.
meanings.sent4: She was the directress of the team, ensuring everyone worked together harmoniously.
meanings.sent5: The directresses, with their dedication, inspired others to follow their lead.
